about_the_game:
From energizing dance rhythms in 80 Days, to soul-stirring gothic tones of Dracula, this soundtrack offers a nostalgic look back at the Frogwares classic games. This is not just music – this is an insight into how it all began almost two decades ago.

This soundtrack includes music from the following games:

  • Journey to the Center of the Earth
  • 80 Days
  • Dracula: Origin
  • Dracula: Love Kills
  • Sherlock Holmes and The Hound of The Baskervilles
  • Department 42: The Mystery of the Nine
  • Secret Missions: Mata Hari and the Kaiser's Submarines
  • Sherlock Holmes and the Mystery of the Frozen City
  • Sherlock Holmes and The Mystery of Osborne House
  • Secret Mission: The Forgotten Island
